headline: Live Nation (LYV): Buy, Sell, or Hold Post Q1 Earnings?
summary: Since July 2020, the S&P 500 has delivered a total return of 97.3%. But one standout stock has more than doubled the market - over the past five years, Live Nation has surged 222% to $145.27 per share. Its momentum hasn’t stopped as it’s also gained 13% in the last six months thanks to its solid quarterly results, beating the S&P by 6.2%.

headline: Q1 Leisure Facilities Earnings: Live Nation (NYSE:LYV) Earns Top Marks
summary: As the Q1 earnings season wraps, let’s dig into this quarter’s best and worst performers in the leisure facilities industry, including Live Nation (NYSE:LYV) and its peers.
